IC Number:
Can you easily climb 2 flights of stairs?
Do you have a fever, cold or infection?
Do you have any loose teeth?
Do you have teeth implants or crowns?
Are you Pregnant?
Do you get breathless on lying flat or at rest?
Do you have any heart disease or heart attacks?
Do you get chest pains?
Do you get irregular heart beats?
Do you have any blood disease or Anaemia?
Do you have Diabetes?
Do you have thyroid problems?
Do you have any kidney disease or dialysis?
Do you have any Jaundice or Liver Disease?
Do you mostly get a sour taste in the mouth lying flat?
Have you had any strokes or mini strokes or paralysis?
Do you have epilepsy or fits?
Do you have relatives who had reaction to Anaesthesia?
Do you have a psychiatric illness?
Do you have joint disease/Arthritis/Muscular disease?
Do you smoke?
Do have any Asthma/Lung problems/Sleep apnea?
Do you Snore loudly?
Do you mostly feel tired in the daytime?
Do you sometimes stop breathing in sleep?
Do you regularly consume alcohol?
Do you have High Blood pressure?
Do you have Allergies?
Did you have operations or surgeries in the past?
Did you get Nausea or Vomiting after surgery?
Are you taking traditional Chinese herbal medication?
Do you taking any medications?
